description:
A versatile jersey for your chillier rides. On its own, with a base layer, or as a mid-layer under a jacket or vest, the Callaghan is a comfy 3-season jersey. Made using a soft merino blend, you get the breathability and wicking of wool, with the durability of a synthetic.

  • Technical fabric has a wear resistant polyester exterior and soft brushed merino interior
  • Articulated patterning flows and moves with you
  • Reverse coil front zipper helps keep the elements out
  • 5-pocket system has 3 drop-in pockets, a small zippered side pocket and a large zippered side pocket
  • Patch pocket design keeps the jersey comfortable even when the pockets are full
  • Subtle reflective details help keep you seen
  • Dropped hem provides extra coverage and stays put
  • 7mesh has a crash replacement program, so if you damage your gear within the first 30 days of purchase, 7mesh will (at their discretion) repair or replace your item. They can even help you keep your old gear going, helping to repair crashed apparel, charging only a small fee to cover the service
name: 7mesh Callaghan Merino Jersey - Women's
